title: Sabor y Vida
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Peruvian
description: Simple place serving breakfast, sandwiches, salads, fruit salads. Set menu with a few choices for an appetizer and a few for a main course, plus you get bread, fruit dessert, and a drink. Also sells juices, and a few other things. Calm atmosphere.
